CURRICULUM VITAE

CAREER OBJECTIVE
 
 
To obtain the position of a Technical Support Networking (L1) in an organization
where, I can utilize my professional skills and experience towards the growth of
the organization and make use of my extensive knowledge and skills and
synergize with the organization to focus on, and achieve, the long term goals that
have been put into place. 
PROFESSIONAL STRENGTHS
 
 
Comprehensive knowledge of CISCO networking technologies and protocols.
Installing, Configuration & Troubleshooting recovery up-gradation & back
schedule.
Skilled in designing, planning and implementing LAN/WAN infrastructure,
routing protocol.
TECHNICAL SKILLS
 
 
CCNA 
 
 (CISCO CERTIFIED NETWORK ASSOCIATE
 
 ) 
 training from Network Bulls,
Gurugram, Haryana.
Operating Systems

Windows XP/98/7/8/ 
Software

Microsoft Outlook, Microsoft office suite
Routing protocols

Protocols in OSI & TCP/IP model, Active Directory

IPV4 & IPV6 (sub netting)

OSPF & EIGRP (load balancing equal and unequal) &
Ethernet
LAN/WAN

Frame Relay, IP Routing, HDLC, ISDN, VoIP, RIP,
VPN, VLAN
 IP services 

Telnet, DHCP, DNS, SMTP, HTTPs
RESPONSIBILITY
 
 

Installation & Configuration of Windows OS Xp, Vista, Windows7 etc &
application software.

Troubleshooting of PC Problem (Hardware and Software).

Troubleshoot & solution of network related problems also internet related
problems.

Resolve email configuration in Outlook & Express.

Managing with network essentials like Switches, Hubs, cables and connectors.

Installation & Configure local printer on client PCs and troubleshooting of
printer problem.

Install & Configure network printer on client PCs through network.

Backup & Restore of mails, troubleshooting of mails related problems.

Creation of user accounts, modifying user properties & assigning rights to the
users

Join computers into domain.
